content.body: Hey, I noticed that the spec says `[[IsLockFree1]]` and `[[IsLockFree2]]` must be set for an agent cluster and can't change, but it doesn't say anything about `[[IsLockFree8]]`

content.body: I thought this must have been intentional, but then I realized that `BigInt64Array` was of course added after the rest of TypedArrays
